author: Austin Songer
description: Identifies when Microsoft Cloud App Security reported when a user uploads files to the cloud that might be infected with ransomware.
false_positives: If Cloud App Security identifies, for example, a high rate of file uploads or file deletion activities it may represent an adverse encryption process.
name: Microsoft 365 Potential ransomware activity
note:
## Config

The Microsoft 365 Fleet integration, Filebeat module, or similarly structured data is required to be compatible with this rule.
query: event.dataset:o365.audit and event.provider:SecurityComplianceCenter and event.category:web and event.action:"Potential ransomware activity" and event.outcome:success
